title: What causes rubberised plastic to go sticky and how do I delay ... - Reddit
body: When new, it gives a high quality feel to the finish, but over time this rubber seems to degrade and go sticky. This has happened to Mice, iPod protector, AOR RF Receiver, and most recently an almost unused Dualit mixer to name just a few. Initially the items are a bit tacky, progressing to full on gunk. The mixer I have has probably only been ...
